manifest.name: intl-messageformat
manifest.description: Formats ICU Message strings with number, date, plural, and select placeholders to create localized messages.

scripts.build: yarn run tsc && yarn run rollup
scripts.tsc: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && api-extractor run --local

manifest.readme:
# Intl MessageFormat

We've migrated the docs to https://formatjs.io.
